abstract: When John Browne, the former chief executive of BP, resigned from Goldman Sachs‘s board of directors last week, it was hard to escape the conclusion that Goldman had inadvertently contributed to a nasty episode of homophobia, Matthew Lynn writes in a Bloomberg News column.
